description: This roast leg of lamb is coated in sumac, oregano and garlic and slow-cooked to perfection. Serve with roast veg for a delicious Sunday lunch dish.
name: Roast Lamb With Vegetables Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove lamb from oven and rest for 10 minutes before slicing. Serve lamb with roast vegetables, parsley and lemon wedges.
